CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 13, 1954, pg. 12, reads: "Testimonial - Members of Grace Memorial Church and the music groups gave a testimonial for Robert Lewis, Sunday, Feb. 7, at the church. Mr. Lewis, one of Pittsburgh's pioneer music masters, recently retired from the Freehold Real Estate Company after fifty years of excellent service.  Here Mr. Lewis is shown with Mrs. Nathaniel Dandridge and the Rev. Harold Tolliver and members of the committee. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait including guest of honor Robert Lewis, Helen Dandridge, and Rev. Harold Tolliver, posed in Grace Memorial Church
